metadata.title: CVE-2023-52500 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:scsi: pm80xx: Avoid leaking tags when processingOPC_INB_SET_CONTROLLER_CONFIG commandTags allocated for OPC_INB_SET_CONTROLLER_CONFIG command need to be freedwhen we receive the response.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
